txt.en:
'At your service, [placeholder]. Now that you have learned the ways of the fisherman, perhaps you could aid me in delivering a message to an old friend.

'I wish to inform Nokki of my latest catch, the largest I have ever seen and I daresay the largest ever caught in Ered Luin! It was enormous, I tell you -- nearly a stone in weight! A pity that I don't have proof of my catch, for after I had the beast in my bucket it made a mighty leap and escaped back into the channel.

'Go to Noglond and speak with Nokki. Tell him of my catch and see if he has caught any bigger.'

'Another fish-tale from Refkell? You are the third person this week to come from him with stories of a giant catch that managed to slip through his fingers.\n\n'But never mind that. If you are in need of fishing supplies you will find no greater store of equipment to suit your needs anywhere else.'
'Have you told Nokki my tale? He is at Noglond, south of Thorin's Hall, along the road to the Low Lands.'
Refkell is incredibly proud of his last catch and wishes to show it off to his friend.
Noglond is south of Thorin's Hall, south and east of the Vale of Thrain, along the road to the Low Lands.\n\nRefkell has asked that you visit Nokki and tell him of his latest catch.
